title: Intelligent Playbook Automation
excerpt: Introducing smart playbook switching and AI-powered talk track recommendations that adapt to your conversation flow in real-time.

content.content: Our new Playbook Automation system revolutionizes how sales teams navigate complex enterprise conversations. The AI now intelligently switches between playbooks based on conversation context and stakeholder changes.
